column3: We need to replace the  "(or ping wumpus on IRC, he has specific tooling to generate the list of merged pulls" as well. This concerns the `list-pulls.py` script which is already in the maintainer tools, and is documented here: https://github.com/bitcoin-core/bitcoin-maintainer-tools#list-pulls\n(though even with that it's  a lot of work to make the PR list for a major release, it just lightens th
